display.title: A Choice
description: &&oMaybe not a sensible one, but a choice nonetheless.&&r
A &&3Suit Station&&r is capable of preparing a &&3Void Diving Suit&&r for a &&3Void Dive&&r - a dangerous form of &&dfast travel&&r between &&3Void Geysers&&r.

Suit &&3hull&&r can be filled with &&3fluxes&&r like &&eCharcoal&&r and &&3Honeycomb&&r, Suit &&3fuel&&r can be filled by smelting &&eGlowstone Dust&&r at the station, and Suit &&3oxygen&&r is filled over time.
With all three filled and equipped, you can stand on a &&3Diving Plate&&r near a Geyser and &&7[&&r&&6Sneak&&r&&7]&&r to enter the void.
Travelling between known &&3Geysers&&r with &&3Diving Plates&&r using &&7[&&r&&6Left-Click&&r&&7]&&r is auto-calculated to be safe.
Moving around with &&7[&&r&&6WASD&&r&&7]&&r can be used to travel to Geysers without known Diving Plates, but can be &&dquite deadly&&r!
